name: Aurélien Lemesle
body:
Hi, my name is Aurélien Lemesle _"O-ray-liːn Luh-may-luh"_, not really easy to pronunce I guess.

I'm studying IT/computer science in Epitech (European Institute of Technology) based in Paris area.
I'm native from France and I'm actually studying IT & Management in Sweden in Jönköping university for one year in part of my program.

I'm looking for an interesting professional experience which could bring me some good technical knowledge.

## Education
* Epitech - European Institute of Technology (2009 - 2014)
* Jönköping University (August 2012 - May 2013)

## Skills

* Ruby
* Ruby on Rails
* C
* C++
* Java
* jQuery
* CoffeeScript
* Haml
* Sass

## Experience

### Ruby on Rails developer [@Reunik](http://reunik.com/)
I participated in the development of a facebook web based application called [BestOfPhotos](http://www.bestofphotos.fr/) (May 2012 - July 2012).

### Web technologies Teaching Assistant [@Sup'internet](http://supinternet.fr/)
Teaching Assistant for Sup'internet students in first year. Helping them with PHP, HTML, CSS, and SQL (September 2011 - July 2012).

### Ruby on Rails developer [@Custle](http://www.custle.com/)
Backend Development of Ruby on Rails applications (December 2011 - April 2012).

### Web Developer at OXO communication
Showcase and e-business websites development (July 2010 - December 2010).

## Languages
French is my native proficiency, I'm fluent in English. I never had a professional experience in an english working environment yet, but I would be really interested to have this kind of experience. 

Since september 2012, I started to learn swedish och jag fortsätta att öva min svenska när jag har ledig tid med [Memrise](http://www.memrise.com/) och att tala med mina svenska vänner :).
Det skulle också vara riktigt intressant för mig att arbeta i en svensk professionell miljö.

## Interests
* Project Management
* Software development
* New Technologies
* Travelling
